name: Pirate Mike And Friends
description:
Join Pirate Mike and his friends, as they play and practice basic skills on a sea inspired scenario. The main game is a pirate ship game with pirate Mike.

  • Available in Spanish, English, German or Portuguese
  • 8 different educational and fun games teach children about music, letters, shapes, math, animals, sequences and matching.
  • More than 10 puzzles in the puzzle game
  • Play 8 different instruments in the music game
  • Train additions and subtractions from 1 to 10 in the math game
  • Learn the alphabet by drawing in the letters game
How the app works

This app is a full immersion in the language. Children follow the instructions in the main menu and listen to the reinforcements and rewards. The user chooses a pirate and follow his instructions on each game. Each game is easy to play and focuses on a basic skill.
